mapper.select: select id from collect where account = #{account} and goodsId = #{goodsId} limit 1;
mapper.delete: delete from collect where account = #{account} and goodsId = #{goodsId} limit 1;
mapper.select: select c.goodsId, c.createdAt, g.goodsTypeId, g.originalPrice, g.discountPrice, g.cover, g.mainTitle, g.subTitle from collect c, goods g where account = #{account} and c.goodsId = g.goodsId order by c.createdAt desc;
